title: Berd Rolls Out Peregrine Aero Wheels with HED Cycling
content:
Berd Spokes, makers of Polylight Spokes, that are tough enough to last the rigors of the Tour Divide, just announced an all-new aero wheelset, the Peregrine Aero Wheels ($2495). Created with HED Cycling, combine ultra-light Berd spokes and HED’s aero design for a faster, smoother ride. Built on the HED Vanquish V62 rim, these wheels just look fast and, needless to say, are extremely aero…

The Lightest Bicycle Spokes in the World

The Berd Polylight Spokes in the Peregrine wheels are the lightest in the world, offering a smooth and forgiving ride. Thanks to their natural vibration-damping properties, they balance out the stiffness of aerodynamic carbon rims, giving you a more comfortable, enjoyable ride without getting beat up by the road.

Flagship Berd Talon Hubs

The Peregrine Aero wheels are built with Berd Talon hubs, designed specifically for Berd spokes. At just 359 grams for the set, these hubs deliver top-tier durability and performance, competing with the best on the market. Available with 11-Speed, Microspline, or XDR drivers.

Made in Minnesota!

For a fully USA-made, all-Minnesota wheelset, we’ve got a special version of the Peregrine, built with Onyx Vesper Hook Flange hubs. These wheels are completely manufactured and assembled within 60 miles of each other, making them a true local product—crafted right here in Minnesota by Berd, Onyx, and HED.

MSRP:

  • $2,495.00 w/Berd Talon Hubs
  • $2,495.00 w/Industry Nine Solix Hubs
  • $2,495.00 w/Onyx Vesper Hook Flange Hubs

Warranty:

  • 5-Year Limited Warranty
  • 5-Year $300 Crash Replacement Service
